title: Leonardo AI â€” AI Tool Review
description: Leonardo AI is a versatile AI image platform with fine-tuned models for game assets, concept art, and photorealistic imagery. Leonardo AI is an AI image generation platform built for creatives, offering a wide range of specialized models for different styles including game assets, concept art, portraits, and photorealism. It features custom model training, AI canvas for editing, image motion for video, and a generous free tier. Popular with game developers and concept artists. Highlights: Specialized models for game/concept art. Custom model fine-tuning. Generous free tier (150 tokens/day). Canvas for image editing. Active development.
